languages.text: {n}Несколько простолюдинов переговариваются громким шепотом, не замечая вас. Стоящий к вам спиной стриженный под горшок с проплешинами мужчина активно жестикулирует.{/n} "Вот уж не думал, что при жизни такое случится! Нов{rt_mf|ый|ая} Звездн{rt_mf|ый|ая} Госпо{rt_mf|дин|жа} прибыл{rt_mf||а}! Говорят, спустил{rt_mf|ся|ась} с небес на огромной железной птице, выш{rt_mf|ел|ла} из ее нутра в золотом доспехе и все, кто видел {rt_mf|его|ее}, ослепли от благолепия. А как иначе? То помазанни{rt_mf|к|ца} Его!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Трое простолюдинов переговариваются громким шепотом, не замечая вас. Стоящий к вам спиной стриженый под горшок с проплешинами мужчина активно жестикулирует.{/n} "Слыхали? Нов{mf|ый|ая} Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа} прибыл{mf||а}. Говорят, спустил{mf|ся|ась} с небес на огромной железной птице, выш{mf|ел|ла} из ее нутра в золотом доспехе и все, кто видел {mf|его|ее}, ослепли от благолепия. А как иначе? То помазанни{mf|к|ца} Бога-Императора".

languages.text: {n}Several commoners are talking in a loud whisper, taking no notice of you. A balding man with a bowl cut is gesturing energetically, his back turned toward you.{/n} "Never thought a thing like this would happen in my time! A new Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} has paid us a visit! They say {rt_mf|he|she} descended from the sky on a great bird of iron, then stepped out of its belly clad in golden armour. Any who saw {rt_mf|him|her} were blinded by the splendour. That's His anointed for you!"
languages.original_text: {n}Несколько простолюдинов переговариваются громким шепотом, не замечая вас. Стоящий к вам спиной стриженный под горшок с проплешинами мужчина активно жестикулирует.{/n} "Вот уж не думал, что при жизни такое случится! Нов{rt_mf|ый|ая} Звездн{rt_mf|ый|ая} Госпо{rt_mf|дин|жа} прибыл{rt_mf||а}! Говорят, спустил{rt_mf|ся|ась} с небес на огромной железной птице, выш{rt_mf|ел|ла} из ее нутра в золотом доспехе и все, кто видел {rt_mf|его|ее}, ослепли от благолепия. А как иначе? То помазанни{rt_mf|к|ца} Его!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Several commoners are talking in a loud whisper, not noticing you. A balding man with a bowl cut, who's standing with his back to you, is gesturing energetically.{/n} "Never thought a thing like this would happen in my lifetime! The new Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} is here! They say {rt__mf|he|she} descended from the sky on a great bird of iron, stepped out of its belly clad in golden armour, and any who saw {rt_mf|him|her} was blinded by the splendour. Could you expect any less when {rt_mf|he|she} is one of His anointed?"

Any who saw {rt_mf|him|her} were blinded by the splendour. That's His anointed for you!"

languages.text: {n}几个平民大声交头接耳，没注意到你。一个剃着地中海发型的秃头男子正热情地手舞足蹈，背对着你。{/n}“我从来没想过，我这辈子居然能经历这样的事情！一位新的上界之主来了这个世界！大家都说，{rt_mf|他|她}骑着一只巨大的铁鸟从天而降，然后从铁鸟的肚子里走了出来，浑身上下穿着金灿灿的盔甲！所有亲眼见到这壮观景象的人都被闪瞎了眼睛，因为{rt_mf|他|她}是帝皇的神选者！”
languages.original_text: {n}Several commoners are talking in a loud whisper, taking no notice of you. A balding man with a bowl cut is gesturing energetically, his back turned toward you.{/n} "Never thought a thing like this would happen in my time! A new Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} has paid us a visit! They say {rt_mf|he|she} descended from the sky on a great bird of iron, then stepped out of its belly clad in golden armour. Any who saw {rt_mf|him|her} were blinded by the splendour. That's His anointed for you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}几个平民大声交头接耳，没注意到你。一个剃着地中海发型的秃头男子正热情地手舞足蹈，背对着你。{/n}“我从来没想过，我这辈子居然能经历这样的事情！一位新的上界之主来了这个世界！大家都说，{rt_mf|他|她}骑着一只巨大的铁鸟从天而降，然后从铁鸟的肚子里走了出来，浑身上下穿着金灿灿的盔甲！所有亲眼见到这壮观景象的人都被闪瞎了眼睛，因为{rt_mf|他|她}是帝皇的神选者！”

languages.text: {n}Varios plebeyos hablan entre susurros sin prestarte atención. Un hombre con corte de tazón que se está quedando calvo gesticula enérgicamente, dándote la espalda.{/n} «¡No pensaba que llegaría a ver el día! ¡{rt_mf|Un nuevo Señor Celestial|Una nueva Señora Celestial} viene a visitarnos! Dicen que descendió de los cielos en un gran pájaro de acero y que salió de su vientre ataviad{rt_mf|o|a} con armadura dorada. Y todos los que {rt_mf|lo|la} vieron quedaron cegados por el esplendor. ¡Así es su {rt_mf|ungido|ungida}!».
languages.original_text: {n}Several commoners are talking in a loud whisper, taking no notice of you. A balding man with a bowl cut is gesturing energetically, his back turned toward you.{/n} "Never thought a thing like this would happen in my time! A new Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} has paid us a visit! They say {rt_mf|he|she} descended from the sky on a great bird of iron, then stepped out of its belly clad in golden armour. Any who saw {rt_mf|him|her} were blinded by the splendour. That's His anointed for you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Varios plebeyos hablan entre susurros sin prestarte atención. Un hombre con corte de tazón que se está quedando calvo gesticula enérgicamente, dándote la espalda.{/n} «¡No pensaba que llegaría a ver el día! ¡{rt_mf|Un nuevo Señor Celestial|Una nueva Señora Celestial} viene a visitarnos! Dicen que descendió de los cielos en un gran pájaro de acero y que salió de su vientre ataviad{rt_mf|o|a} con armadura dorada. Y todos los que {rt_mf|lo|la} vieron quedaron cegados por el esplendor. ¡Así es su {rt_mf|ungido|ungida}!».

languages.text: {n}Birkaç avam, yüksek sesle fısıldaşıyor. Seni fark etmiyorlar. Tas kesimli kel bir adam, sırtı sana dönük hâlde enerjikçe el kol hareketleri yapıyor.{/n} "Benim zamanımda böyle bir şeyin olacağını hiç düşünmezdim! Yeni Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz} bizi ziyarete gelmiş! Büyük bir demir kuşun üzerinde gökten indiğini, sonra karnından altın zırhlara bürünmüş hâlde çıktığını söylüyorlar. Onu görenler ihtişamından kör olmuş. İşte O'nun kutsanmışı dediğin böyle olur!"
languages.original_text: {n}Several commoners are talking in a loud whisper, taking no notice of you. A balding man with a bowl cut is gesturing energetically, his back turned toward you.{/n} "Never thought a thing like this would happen in my time! A new Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} has paid us a visit! They say {rt_mf|he|she} descended from the sky on a great bird of iron, then stepped out of its belly clad in golden armour. Any who saw {rt_mf|him|her} were blinded by the splendour. That's His anointed for you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Birkaç avam, yüksek sesle fısıldaşıyor. Seni fark etmiyorlar. Tas kesimli kel bir adam, sırtı sana dönük hâlde enerjikçe el kol hareketleri yapıyor.{/n} "Benim zamanımda böyle bir şeyin olacağını hiç düşünmezdim! Yeni Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz} bizi ziyarete gelmiş! Büyük bir demir kuşun üzerinde gökten indiğini, sonra karnından altın zırhlara bürünmüş hâlde çıktığını söylüyorlar. Onu görenler ihtişamından kör olmuş. İşte O'nun kutsanmışı dediğin böyle olur!"

languages.text: {n}複数の平民が、あなたに気づかずに大声で噂話をしている。丸刈りのハゲ頭の男は、あなたに背を向け熱心に身振り手振りしている。{/n}「生きてる間にこんなことが起こるなんて考えたこともなかった！新しい天の{rt_mf|君|姫}が訪問された！皆、{rt_mf|君|姫}が鉄の大きな鳥に乗って空から降りてきて、黄金のアーマーを身にまとってそのお腹から出てきたと言っている。{rt_mf|君|姫}を見た者は皆その輝きで盲目になってしまった。あれは陛下の後継者だ！」
languages.original_text: {n}Several commoners are talking in a loud whisper, taking no notice of you. A balding man with a bowl cut is gesturing energetically, his back turned toward you.{/n} "Never thought a thing like this would happen in my time! A new Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} has paid us a visit! They say {rt_mf|he|she} descended from the sky on a great bird of iron, then stepped out of its belly clad in golden armour. Any who saw {rt_mf|him|her} were blinded by the splendour. That's His anointed for you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}複数の平民が、あなたに気づかずに大声で噂話をしている。丸刈りのハゲ頭の男は、あなたに背を向け熱心に身振り手振りしている。{/n}「生きてる間にこんなことが起こるなんて考えたこともなかった！新しい天の{rt_mf|君|姫}が訪問された！皆、{rt_mf|君|姫}が鉄の大きな鳥に乗って空から降りてきて、黄金のアーマーを身にまとってそのお腹から出てきたと言っている。{rt_mf|君|姫}を見た者は皆その輝きで盲目になってしまった。あれは陛下の後継者だ！」

languages.text: {n}Plusieurs roturiers discutent à voix haute sans vous prêter attention. Le dos tourné vers vous, un homme dégarni à la coupe au bol fait de grands gestes.{/n} « Je ne pensais pas voir ça un jour ! {rt_mf|Un nouveau|Une nouvelle} {rt_mf|Seigneur|Seigneure} Céleste est {rt_mf|venu|venue} nous rendre visite ! Il paraît qu'{rt_mf|il|elle} est {rt_mf|descendu|descendue} du ciel sur un grand oiseau de fer, et qu'{rt_mf|il|elle} est {rt_mf|sorti|sortie} de son ventre {rt_mf|vêtu|vêtue} d'une armure d'or. Tous ceux qui l'ont {rt_mf|contemplé|contemplée} ont été aveuglés par sa splendeur. C'est bien Son {rt_mf|élu|élue} ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Several commoners are talking in a loud whisper, taking no notice of you. A balding man with a bowl cut is gesturing energetically, his back turned toward you.{/n} "Never thought a thing like this would happen in my time! A new Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} has paid us a visit! They say {rt_mf|he|she} descended from the sky on a great bird of iron, then stepped out of its belly clad in golden armour. Any who saw {rt_mf|him|her} were blinded by the splendour. That's His anointed for you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Plusieurs roturiers discutent à voix haute sans vous prêter attention. Le dos tourné vers vous, un homme dégarni à la coupe au bol fait de grands gestes.{/n} « Je ne pensais pas voir ça un jour ! {rt_mf|Un nouveau|Une nouvelle} {rt_mf|Seigneur|Seigneure} Céleste est {rt_mf|venu|venue} nous rendre visite ! Il paraît qu'{rt_mf|il|elle} est descendue du ciel sur un grand oiseau de fer, et qu'{rt_mf|il|elle} est sortie de son ventre {rt_mf|vêtu|vêtue} d'une armure d'or. Tous ceux qui l'ont {rt_mf|contemplé|contemplée} ont été aveuglés par sa splendeur. C'est bien Son {rt_mf|élu|élue} ! »

languages.text: {n}Mehrere einfache Leute unterhalten sich laut flüsternd, ohne Notiz von dir zu nehmen. Ein Mann mit hoher Stirn und Topfschnitt steht mit dem Rücken zu dir und gestikuliert beim Sprechen wild.{/n} "Ich hätte nie gedacht, dass so etwas einmal zu meinen Lebzeiten geschieht! {rt_mf|Ein neuer himmlischer Herr|Eine neue himmlische Herrin} besucht uns! Es heißt, {rt_mf|er|sie} sei in einem großen Vogel aus Eisen vom Himmel gekommen und in einer goldenen Rüstung aus dessen Bauch getreten. Jeder, der {rt_mf|ihn|sie} sah, wurde von seiner Herrlichkeit geblendet. Das ist {rt_mf|Sein Auserwählter|Seine Auserwählte}!"
languages.original_text: {n}Several commoners are talking in a loud whisper, taking no notice of you. A balding man with a bowl cut is gesturing energetically, his back turned toward you.{/n} "Never thought a thing like this would happen in my time! A new Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} has paid us a visit! They say {rt_mf|he|she} descended from the sky on a great bird of iron, then stepped out of its belly clad in golden armour. Any who saw {rt_mf|him|her} were blinded by the splendour. That's His anointed for you!"
